channel.title: Google on Documentation for Admost API Services
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Documentation for Admost API Services

item.title: Get Credential
item.description: Step-by-step guide for creating your Play service credentials In order for Admost’s servers to communicate with Google on your behalf you need to provide a set of service credentials. The process for configuring these credentials is a bit complex, but the added level of control improves security by only providing Admost with the access we need. 1. Link to a Google Developer Project Your Play Developer account needs to be linked to a Google Developer Project.

item.title: Server to Server Notification
item.description: Ensure Google Cloud Pub/Sub is enabled for your project. You can enable it here
